channel.title: Carolina Cloud Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Carolina Cloud Blog

item.title: Genomics Pipeline: Saving 70% Per Month with a Superior Development Experience
item.description:
A genomics startup with less than a year of runway needed to build a pipeline for processing cattle genomic data—merging chromosomal data from hundreds of animals to identify genetic markers. They’d been using AWS HealthOmics for other genomics tasks, but as they evaluated their options for this greenfield project, two problems emerged: the cost would be prohibitive, and the developer experience would make iteration nearly impossible.

This is the story of how they built their pipeline on Carolina Cloud’s bare metal Threadripper infrastructure and gained the development velocity they desperately needed—with 70% cost savings as a bonus.

item.title: Real-Time Call Center Transcription: Over 90% Cost Reduction with Better Features
item.description:
After six months with Azure OpenAI’s Whisper API, a major call center needed a better solution. They were processing hundreds of thousands of minutes of audio per day, and costs were climbing. More importantly, they needed speaker diarization—something the OpenAI API simply didn’t offer.

Without diarization, they couldn’t answer critical performance management questions: What percentage of agents proactively offered a specific solution? What percentage mentioned key product features? Which agents needed coaching on particular topics? These insights were locked behind the technical limitation of not knowing who said what.
